original_text:
Though you have made me see troubles,
    many and bitter,
    you will restore my life again;
from the depths of the earth
    you will again bring me up.
korean_text: 우리에게 여러 가지 심한 고난을 보이신 주께서 우리를 다시 살리시며 땅 깊은 곳에서 다시 이끌어 올리시리이다

sentences.original_text: Though you have made me see troubles
you will restore my life again
from the depths of the earth
you will again bring me up
